koohiiStory1: Remember the tale of Cleopatra? She was MOURNING the loss of her Marc Antony, so she placed the asp SNAKE to her HEART.
koohiiStory2: You are mourning the death of a relative, and it feels as if a snake had bitten into your heart. -- "mourning feels like snake-bitten heart".
myStory: đau buồn vì ai chết. đi vòng trong tim. tại tim
readingExamples: 忌まわしい (い.まわしい), 忌む (い.む)
